Class LightingOnOff

      SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.StateControls.LightingOnOff
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGL_Renderable
public class LightingOnOff
extends Node

This node allows turning lighting on and off in the course of rendering a scene graph.
